channel.title: admin on Yuanyuan Yang
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Yuanyuan Yang

item.description: I am a first-year Ph.D. student in Algorithms, Combinatorics, and Optimization (ACO) at Georgia Institute of Technology, based in the School of Industrial and Systems Engineering. I am fortunate to be advised by Jamie Morgenstern. My main research interests are in Fairness, Mechanism Design and Algorithmic Game Theory. Before attending Georgia Institute of Technology, I spent six months at EconCS group at Harvard University, under the supervision of Professor Yiling Chen.
